data.title: Connecticut's Top 22 Broadcasting Companies Uncovered
data.meta_description: A comprehensive dive into Connecticut's top broadcasting companies including NBC Sports and Wtnh-tv. Discover an industry embracing digital transformation while delivering varied content to its audience.
data.text:
Broadcasting companies, specifically located in Connecticut, continue to play a crucial role in disseminating news, entertainment, and sports updates to the masses. The industry is extremely dynamic, housing a broad range of companies that deliver diverse content through various platforms â be it traditional networks or digital mediums. Some offer coverage in distinct areas like sports or entertainment, while others provide a more general content perspective including political updates, education news, and local programming. As audience habits evolve, these companies are continuously innovating their delivery channels, keeping pace with the accelerating transition from traditional broadcast to livestreams and on-demand content.

Top 22 broadcasting companies in Connecticut

1. NBC Sports

Website: nbcsports.com

Headquarters: Stamford, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1995

Headcount: 10001+

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

NBC Sports is a media company that provides coverage and commentary on various sports events and news. It offers live streaming, articles, videos, and analysis of different sports including football, basketball, baseball, and more.

2. Wtnh-tv

Website: wtnh.com

Headquarters: New Haven, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1948

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WTNH/WCTX is a company that provides news, weather updates, and sports updates through their digital platforms. They also offer local programming and cover various topics such as education, politics, and entertainment.

3. Q30 Television

Website: q30tv.com

Headquarters: Hamden, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1995

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

q30tv.com is a website that provides live YouTube broadcasts and coverage of various events such as sports matches, music awards, and news. It offers access to Q30 Television content and resources.

4. Sea Tv

Website: seatvnetwork.com

Headquarters: New Haven, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Ipo

LinkedIn

Sea TV Network Limited is a company that offers a wide variety of regional and international digital TV channels, high-speed internet access through optical fiber cable network, and convenient recharge packages. They provide unparalleled picture quality and advanced cable network infrastructure. Sea TV Network aims to enhance the TV-watching experience for viewers with true digital and high-definition sound and picture quality.

5. Wqaq 98.1 Fm

Website: wqaq.com

Headquarters: Hamden, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1970

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WQAQ is a radio station that provides a diverse range of entertainment and information to the Quinnipiac University community. They offer live shows, music events, and engage with their audience through social media platforms.

6. WHUS Radio

Website: whus.org

Headquarters: Storrs Mansfield, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1922

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WHUS is a radio station offering a variety of shows and podcasts on different topics like music, news, sports, and talk. They provide content for a diverse audience and engage with the community through public service announcements and community events.

7. NBC Sports

Website: nbcunicareers.com

Headquarters: Stamford, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1968

Headcount: 10001+

LinkedIn

NBCUniversal Careers is a platform for smart, talented individuals who want to build something new in the content, tech, and culture industries. They embrace the next generation of storytellers and offer opportunities for growth and innovation.

8. TVEyes

Website: tveyes.com

Headquarters: Fairfield, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1999

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

TVEyes is a search engine specifically designed for discovering and quickly finding television or radio coverage. With instant search for every domestic media market - local, regional, national - as well as unmatched global reach, TVEyes helps you discover and pinpoint exactly the right clip at the right time. Monitor and research coverage to develop strategy, report successes, contain crises and train executives.

9. Business TalkRadio Network

Website: businesstalkradio.net

Headquarters: Greenwich, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1999

Headcount: 51-200

BusinessTalkRadio.net is a nationwide network providing entertaining and informative business and lifestyle programming to affiliated radio stations 24/7.

10. First Impressions Advertising And Consulting

Website: firstimpressionstv.com

Headquarters: Windsor, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 1-10

First Impressions Advertising offers a plethora of advertising products from Digital Media, Radio, Broadcast TV, Cable TV and Outdoor Advertising. We also offer marketing surveys for TV, cable and radio before client commits to a media schedule. We have experience in the past 15 years in political advertising and other specialties such as funeral homes, retail organizations and restaurants. Some of our advertising experience in the past and present are Pizza Hut of MD, First Mariner Arena, WWE Wrestling, Law office of William R Buie III, Wylie Funeral Services, Music Go Round, Disney Block Party, Ace Hardware, Pro Bull Riding (PBR), Catonsville Community College (CCBC), Marvin Windows, Radio City Rockettes, and many more. What Our Clients Are Saying! ""We have increased our sales this year by 25%.

11. CV Media

Website: cvmediainc.com

Headquarters: Simsbury, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 1-10

We provide professional media buying services for clients in Connecticut, the Northeast and across the US, including: Consumer B2B Political Campaigns Legislative + Issue Campaigns Not-for-Profit + Associations Financial Services Education Healthcare Media + Broadcast Retail Advertising Agencies Marketing + Public Relations Firms We help our clients achieve higher media impact, directly reduce costs and uncover significant added value opportunities. Need to squeeze more out of your budget? Contact us at charmaine@nullcvmediainc.com or 860-651-8123 to learn more about how CV Media, Inc. can maximize your media buying.

12. Community Club Awards

Website: communityclubawards.com

Headquarters: Westport, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 11-50

CCA is the most successful and longest running broadcast promotion in history. Founded in 1954, CCA was created as a local community Campaign to assist local broadcast properties to: 1) generate new advertiser revenue, 2) expand the station's advertiser base, and 3) to provide documented community service to meet FCC public service requirements. CCA extends community service to the entire community, not a single group or cause.

13. Office of Radio & Television

Website: ortv.org

Headquarters: Prospect, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

ORTV is a Catholic media company that offers TV Mass, radio programs, podcasts, and other religious content. They also provide information for donors and resources for COVID-19.

Website: connoisseurmedia.com

Headquarters: Westport, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Connoisseur Media is a media company deeply involved in the local communities it serves. With a focus on meaningful content and compelling entertainment, they strive to be the top choice for their clients, colleagues, and community. They offer advertising and promotional solutions through radio and digital platforms, hosting events, and providing innovative digital marketing services.

15. Knocking

Website: knocking.com

Website: wpkn.org

Headquarters: Bridgeport, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1963

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

WPKN is a community radio station based in Bridgeport, CT. They offer a variety of programs, podcasts, and special events. With a focus on music, WPKN provides a platform for DJs and volunteers to share their favorite tracks and engage with the local community. They also host documentaries and public affairs discussions. WPKN is a non-profit organization that relies on donations to support their operations.

Website: myairtime.net

Headcount: 11-50

20. InterTech Media

Website: intertechmedia.com

LinkedIn

21. Cynopsis

Website: cynopsis.com

Headquarters: Norwalk, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1997

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

22. PlowShare Group

Website: plowsharegroup.com

Headquarters: Stamford, Connecticut, United States

Founded: 1994

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Plowshare Group is a company that specializes in media distribution and placement for campaigns related to important causes. They have successfully partnered with organizations like Special Olympics, St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, and USA Swimming Foundation to generate awareness and donations. Their efforts have resulted in millions of dollars worth of donated media value. Plowshare Group combines technology and tradition to create effective and impactful campaigns for their clients.
